text: me tv4 is our thinnest TV yet it
measures only four point nine
millimeters at its thinnest point it's
very thin it practically disappears when
seen from a flat angle like when you're
looking at it from the top here or from
the sides and it's also frameless with
barely any bezels it's a really good
looking product I'll go slowly so you
can take pictures as well as many as you
want most TVs out there are designed
with a frame even a very narrow one that
surrounds the display while this is what
me-tv 4 looks like with its frameless
design and when you put them both side
by side you can see the difference is
significant very noticeable me-tv 4
looks cleanly designed and seamless from
any angle even the back the back cover
for example is very compact it only goes
up to about 30% of the height of the
display
